statements: SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas;
SELECT location, regulations FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, location, size FROM marine_protected_areas ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE regulations LIKE '%conservation%';
SELECT size, id, location FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size >= 1000;
SELECT id, location, size, regulations FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE regulations LIKE '%protected%'
SELECT id, location FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY size DESC
SELECT location, size FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE regulations IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT id, location, regulations FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE regulations LIKE '%no fishing%'
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas
SELECT name, type FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT id, name FROM marine_protected_areas ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM protected_area_regulations WHERE enforcement_level = 'high'
SELECT * FROM protected_area_regulations ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE designation = 'Marine Reserve' ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC
SELECT id, name, type FROM protected_area_regulations WHERE effective_date >= '2021-01-01' AND jurisdiction IN ('Federal', 'State') ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, size, designation FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE status = 'Active' AND type = 'National Park' ORDER BY size DESC
SELECT id, jurisdiction, effective_date FROM protected_area_regulations WHERE jurisdiction = 'Federal' OR status = 'Active' AND type = 'Regulation' ORDER BY effective_date ASC
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE type = 'Sanctuary' AND status = 'Proposed' ORDER BY location ASC, name DESC
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas;
SELECT id, location, size FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, common_name, habitat FROM marine_species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM marine_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE regulations IS NOT NULL AND location LIKE 'Pacific%';
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas;
SELECT id, location, size FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT species_name, common_name FROM marine_species WHERE habitat = 'Coral Reef' LIMIT 5;
SELECT mpa.location, ms.species_name, ms.common_name FROM marine_protected_areas mpa JOIN marine_species ms ON mpa.id = ms.id;
SELECT username, email, role FROM marine_users WHERE role = 'Administrator' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas;
SELECT area_id, location, size FROM marine_protected_areas ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT marine_id, species, description FROM marine_life WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM marine_research WHERE research_topic = 'Coral Reef Conservation';
SELECT researcher_name AS researcher, research_topic AS topic FROM marine_research ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM marine_protected_areas ORDER BY location DESC, size ASC

SELECT marine_life.species, marine_protected_areas.location FROM marine_life INNER JOIN marine_protected_areas ON marine_life.area_id = marine_protected_areas.area_id WHERE marine_life.species LIKE '%coral%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_areas, SUM(size) AS total_size FROM marine_protected_areas

SELECT marine_research.research_topic, marine_research.researcher_name, marine_protected_areas.location FROM marine_research INNER JOIN marine_protected_areas ON marine_research.area_id = marine_protected_areas.area_id WHERE marine_research.research_topic LIKE '%conservation%' ORDER BY marine_research.research_topic ASC

SELECT marine_activities.activity_name, marine_activities.activity_description, marine_protected_areas.location FROM marine_activities INNER JOIN marine_protected_areas ON marine_activities.area_id = marine_protected_areas.area_id WHERE marine_protected_areas.size > 100 ORDER BY marine_protected_areas.size DESC
SELECT * FROM MarineAreas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM MarineAreas WHERE size > 1000;
SELECT MAX(size) AS max_size FROM MarineAreas;
SELECT area_name, location, size FROM MarineAreas ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT MA.area_name, MV.visitor_name, MV.visit_date FROM MarineAreas AS MA JOIN MarineVisitors AS MV ON MA.area_id = MV.area_id WHERE MV.age >= 18 ORDER BY MV.visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarineAreas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM MarineAreas WHERE size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM MarineAnimals WHERE species = 'Whale';
SELECT animal_name, habitat FROM MarineAnimals WHERE area_id = 3 ORDER BY habitat DESC;
SELECT area_name, visit_date FROM MarineVisitors WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
